(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
Once each turn, when a creature with power 2 or less you control enters, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.
{1}{W}: Level 2
At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control.
{3}{W}: Level 3
When this Class becomes level 3, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this Class leaves the battlefield.

This spell can't be countered.
Players can't gain life.
{1}{R}: Scorching Condemnation becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature with trample and haste in addition to its other types until end of turn. Activate only during your turn.
Target blocking creature you control dares 10. (It becomes a legendary Rebel with base power and toughness 10/10 in addition to its other types until end of turn.)

{1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Mob Hangman dares 4. (It becomes a legendary Rebel with base power and toughness 4/4 in addition to its other types until end of turn.)
Whenever Mob Hangman attacks, if it's a Rebel, each opponent sacrifices a creature or planeswalker unless they discard a card.

Rebels you control have double strike.
{2}{R}: Telhedo Hoofbruisers dares 4. (It becomes a legendary Rebel with base power and toughness 4/4 in addition to its other types until end of turn.)
When Carving Instructor enters, put a flying counter on target creature you control.

Vigilance
When Hart of Harnelle Wood dies, you may put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control.

Lifelink
Other creatures you control with lifelink get +1/+1.
If another source you control with lifelink dealing damage would cause you to gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.

Once each turn, when you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may create a 1/0 blue Elemental creature token.
Elementals you control get +1/+1.
{2}{U}, Sacrifice an Elemental: Tap up to one target creature. Scry 1.

Trample
{2}{R}: Vengeful Mother gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Trample
When Wallbreaker enters, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature you control with trample. If you do, you may have that creature deal damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

Lifelink
Whenever you gain life, you may pay {B}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control with lifelink.
{4}{B}: Whenever you gain life this turn, each opponent loses that much life.

Menace
When Arrogant Cabalist enters, if you control another Noble, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.
Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards. Create an X/X red Elemental creature token with haste, where X is the number of cards discarded this way.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or Food.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
{1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Colossal Tarasque can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
{2}, Discard Colossal Tarasque: Search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Lifelink, deathtouch
Indulgence (You indulge at the beginning of your end step if you gained 3 or more life and/or drew two or more cards this turn.)
Whenever you indulge, put a +1/+1 counter on each Noble you control.
Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Put a trample counter on that creature.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, put X cards from your hand on the bottom of your library. This spell costs {X} less to cast.
Scry 2, then draw three cards.

{X}: Symbol of the Revolution dares X. X can't be 0. (It becomes a legendary Rebel with base power and toughness X/X in addition to its other types until end of turn.)
As long as Symbol of the Revolution is a Rebel, it has flying, lifelink, and vigilance.

Indulgence (You indulge at the beginning of your end step if you gained 3 or more life and/or drew two or more cards this turn.)
Whenever you indulge, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

Menace
Bastion Breaker can't block.

Other legendary creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever a legendary creature you control attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
Whenever you cast your fifth spell each turn, Juana deals 10 damage to any target.

Adaptive Blade enters with your choice of two different counters on it from among menace, haste, first strike, or trample.
Equipped creature gets +1/+0.
Keyword counters on Adaptive Blade apply to equipped creature.
Equip {1}

(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
Whenever a player finishes exiling cards from anywhere, each opponent loses 1 life.
{2}{B}: Level 2
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of target opponent's library face down. You may look at it for as long as it remains exiled.
{3}{B}: Level 3
You may cast spells exiled with this Class. Those spells cost {1} less to cast, and mana of any type can be spent to cast those spells.

Flying, haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value 4 or greater this turn, you may return Smolderwing from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Flying, haste
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value 4 or greater, you may return Burning Witch to its owner's hand. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
When Meat-Market Heifer is put into a graveyard from anywhere, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

Indulgence (You indulge at the beginning of your end step if you gained 3 or more life and/or drew two or more cards this turn.)
Whenever you indulge, you may exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If you do, cast a copy of that card without paying its mana cost.

Indulgence (You indulge at the beginning of your end step if you gained 3 or more life and/or drew two or more cards this turn.)
Whenever you indulge, choose one -
:: Scry 2. Each opponent loses 2 life.
:: Create a tapped 2/1 black Rogue creature token with menace.
:: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

Trample
Whenever one or more creatures you control with trample deal combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

Protection from deathtouch (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything with deathtouch.)
{T}: Put a deathtouch counter on another target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

Instant and sorcery spells with mana value 4 or greater you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{U}{R}, Sacrifice Samacris: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. The next spell you cast this turn with the same name as that card costs {2} less to cast.

(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
Nobles you control get +1/+1 and have ward {1}.
{B}{W}: Level 2
When this Class becomes level 2, you may search your library for a Noble card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
{1}{B}{W}: Level 3
When this Class becomes level 3, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

Flying, trample
When Blooming Cocollona enters, you may have it deal 3 damage to another target creature or planeswalker. If you do, that permanent's controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control. Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn except by creatures target player controls with counters on them.
Crowdqueller Golem enters the battlefield tapped.
Create two tokens that are copies of target creature. Put a ward {2} counter on one of those tokens and a flying counter on the other.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. Legendary creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

Ward {3}
At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 green Goat Spirit creature token. For each kind of counter on Warden of Herds, you may put that many counters of that kind on that token.
Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life. Put a menace counter on up to one target creature you control.
Whenever another creature dies, if it had one or more counters on it, you may put one of those counters on Wicked Steed.
Return up to one target tapped artifact or creature to its owner's hand. Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)

Whenever Minou, the Russet Whisker attacks, you may tap up to one target creature an opponent controls and untap up to one target creature you control. If the creature you control had vigilance, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

Menace
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on Alehana's Fleshsearer.

Flying
Indulgence (You indulge at the beginning of your end step if you gained 3 or more life and/or drew two or more cards this turn.)
Palace Gargoyle can't attack or block unless you indulged during your last turn.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each kind of counter among permanents you control.
Reach, trample

Whenever an attacking creature you control dies, Storming the Palace deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {R/W}. If you do, create a 1/1 red and white Peasant creature token with haste and "This creature attacks each combat if able."

Ward {1}
Whenever one or more counters are put on Enlightened Naturalist, draw a card for each kind of counter put on it on it that it didn't have already.
True Dexterity deals 4 damage to target attacking, blocking or tapped creature.

When Master of the Dark Arts enters, you may exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If you do, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
Pay 2 life: Master of the Dark Arts gains flying and deathtouch until end of turn.

Whenever another creature you control enters, you may have Inspired Youth dare X, where X is that creature's power. (It becomes a legendary Rebel with base power and toughness X/X in addition to its other types until end of turn.)

Whenever Heraldic Griffin or another creature you control enters, you may put your choice of counter from among lifelink, first strike or vigilance on that creature.
{1}{W}, Remove a counter from a creature you control: That creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

:: 3/2 with trample named Battering Ram.

:: 0/4 with "Whenever this creature attacks, create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens that are tapped and attacking" named Siege Tower.
